TopicTitle: Can't click cursor in tracking station

Articles.Content:
Anyone else experience a bug where they can't click on anything or exit out of the tracking station? I am on Xbox One.

Edited October 6, 2016 by chimpbone
Not at the tracking station but had the same in the flight control centre and astronaut complex, and in flught

6 hours ago, Leopard said:

Not at the tracking station but had the same in the flight control centre and astronaut complex, and in flught

I just had this happen at the astronaut complex as well.

I think its more to do with a general failure of the controls, especially when it comes up "no target", seems like something in the guts of the programme has corrupted so its lost the pointer. It recognises you have clicked the button, but has no valid "target" for that action so does nothing and your stuck.

Seems it can happen pretty much anywhere.

Irritating
